name: Dealpad Limited
description: Developer of sales enablement software designed to help companies realize the potential of their sales motion. The company's platform helps to understand the buyer's journey, and their decision criteria and offers a collaborative process to centralize everything, helping businesses develop the strategy and intel required to convert every sale and its performance.
